scripts._bundle:*//: echo 'RUN ESBUILD ON DIRECTORY OR FILE'
scripts._bundle:tests: echo '[_bundle:tests] \033[1mstarting...\033[0m' && npx concurrently -n '_bundle:tests:node,_bundle:tests:browser' 'npm run _bundle:tests:node' 'npm run _bundle:tests:browser' && npm run _bundle:tests:index
scripts._bundle:src//: echo 'RUN CUSTOM ESBUILD ON src DIRECTORY ðŸš¨ðŸš¨ .scripts'
scripts._bundle:watch:tests//: echo 'RUN _watch NODE +++ RUN _watch BROWSER +++ RUN _watch INDEX'
scripts._bundle:watch:tests: echo '[_bundle:watch:tests] \033[1mstarting...\033[0m' && npx concurrently -n '_bundle:watch:tests:node,_bundle:watch:tests:browser,_bundle:watch:tests:index' 'npm run _bundle:watch:tests:node' 'npm run _bundle:watch:tests:browser' 'npm run _bundle:watch:tests:browser'
scripts._tests: echo '[_tests] \033[1mstarting...\033[0m' && PORT=${PORT:-3000} npm run _tests:node && npm run _tests:headless
scripts._tests:watch:node: echo '[_tests:watch:node] \033[1mstarting...\033[0m' && npm run _tests:node && npx chokidar '.tests/**/*' -c 'npm run _tests:node'
scripts._tests:watch:headless: echo '[_tests:watch:headless] \033[1mstarting...\033[0m' && PORT=${PORT:-3000} npm run _tests:headless && npx chokidar '.tests/**/*' -c 'PORT=${PORT:-3000} npm run _tests:headless'
scripts._tests:watch: echo '[_tests:watch] \033[1mstarting...\033[0m' && PORT=${PORT:-3000} npx concurrently -n '_tests:watch:node,_tests:watch:headless' 'npm run _tests:watch:node' 'npm run _tests:watch:headless'
scripts.build:scripts: echo '[build:scripts] \033[1mstarting...\033[0m' && npm run _make:scripts && npm run _bundle:scripts && npm run _check:scripts
scripts.build:tests: echo '[build:tests] \033[1mstarting...\033[0m' && npm run _make:tests && npm run _bundle:tests && npm run _check:tests
scripts.build:src: echo '[build:src] \033[1mstarting...\033[0m' && npm run _make:lib && npm run _bundle:scripts && npm run _bundle:src && npm run _check:src
scripts.build//: echo 'RUN build:scripts +++ RUN build:tests =====> RUN build:src'
scripts.build: echo '[build] \033[1mstarting...\033[0m' && npx concurrently -n 'build:scripts,build:tests' 'npm run build:scripts' 'npm run build:tests' && npm run build:src
scripts.tests:node: echo '[tests:node] \033[1mstarting...\033[0m' && npm run build:tests && npm run _tests:node
scripts.tests:headless: npm run _serve:tests & pid=$! && echo '[tests:headless] \033[1mstarting...\033[0m' && PORT=${PORT:-3000} npm run build:tests && npm run _tests:headless; kill $pid
scripts.tests: npm run _serve:tests & pid=$! && echo '[tests] \033[1mstarting...\033[0m' && PORT=${PORT:-3000} npm run build:tests && npm run _tests; kill $pid
scripts.start//: echo 'RUN build =====> RUN _serve:tests =====> RUN _bundle:watch:tests ++++ RUN _tests:watch =====> KILL _serve:tests'
scripts.start: npm run _serve:tests & pid=$! && echo '[start] \033[1mstarting...\033[0m' && npm run build && npx concurrently -n '_bundle:watch:tests,_tests:watch' 'npm run _bundle:watch:tests' 'PORT=${PORT:-3000} npm run _tests:watch' && kill $pid
